code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CreateArea(props){const[note,setNote]=useState({title:"",content:""});function handleChange(event){const{name,value}=event.target;setNote(prevNote=>{return{...prevNote,[name]:value};});}function submitNote(event){props.onAdd(note);setNote({title:"",content:""});event.preventDefault();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:handleChange,value:note.title,name:"title",placeholder:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{onChange:handleChange,value:note.content,name:"content",placeholder:"Take a note...",rows:"3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:submitNote,children:"Add"})]})});}export default CreateArea;
